definitions.definition: A thin layer of some substance; a pellicle ; a membranous covering, causing opacity .
examples: a clear plastic film for wrapping food

definitions.definition: A medium used to capture images in a camera .
A visual art form that consists of a sequence of still images preserved on a recording medium to give the illusion of motion; movies generally.
The sequence of still images itself, which produces a moving image when played; a movie .
A slender thread , such as that of a cobweb .

main_definition: A thin layer of some substance; a pellicle ; a membranous covering, causing opacity .
secondary_definitions: ( photography ) A medium used to capture images in a camera .
( uncountable ) A visual art form that consists of a sequence of still images preserved on a recording medium to give the illusion of motion; movies generally.
( countable ) The sequence of still images itself, which produces a moving image when played; a movie .
A slender thread , such as that of a cobweb .
